short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a table which contains all interactable elements xPaths on the open webpage. Can be exported in a txt or POM format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to get all interactable objects on a page and give you xPaths to identify all of them. This should accelerate your development timeline in regards to automating websites. It also allows you to export the created table into a (Page Object Model) POM or csv format.
